questions.text: what is decided will be given and passed down to each mayor of the City of Ember?
why did the 7th mayor try and destroy the box and then hide it in a closet?
questions.answer: Because he thought it might hold information that would cure his sickness

questions.text: what do the young people of the highest class receive by drawing from a bag?
what is considered the most important job?
what jobs do Lina and Doon trade?
who does Lina live with?
questions.answer: Her grandmother and her baby sister

questions.text: what is one of the 4 rules for Messengers?
questions.answer: When a customer gives you a message, repeat it back; Always wear your red jacket so people can identify you; Go as fast as possible; Deliver a message only to the person it's meant for

questions.text: when Lina goes to deliver a message to the Mayor, what part of the Gathering Hall Building does she end up?
what does Doon break the rules to go see on his first day on the job as Pipeworks Laborer?
what type of shop does Doon live above?
what is Doon's main purpose in being a Pipeworks Laborer?
questions.answer: He wants to find something important/find a way to help the City of Ember

questions.text: what kind of bug did Doon find and start taking care of?
what do the inhabitants of the city call the space of darkness that is past the city?
what type of seed does Clary give Lina as she is leaving the greenhouse and they are discussing where life comes from?
what does Lina imagine is beyond the city?
what two colors does Lina pick for the two colored pencils she will purchase?
what happens to Poppy while Lina is purchasing colored pencils?
what happens when the Mayor calls a town meeting?
questions.answer: People start yelling, throwing, surging forward, are angry

questions.text: what does Lina find in Poppy's hands and mouth and strewn about that came from inside the box her Granny found in the closet?
who does Lina take the message full of holes to in order to try and get help to decipher it?
what does Lina discover Lizzie is receiving from Looper Windly?
questions.answer: Rare canned goods like peaches, applesauce and creamed corn

questions.text: who gives Lina and Poppy a place to live after their grandmother dies?
when Doon is called "bug boy" by his fellow Pipeworkers, what does he do out of anger?
questions.answer: Steps on a bug he had found

questions.text: who do readers discover has been receiving deliveries from the secret storage room below the city behind a locked door?
what do Lina and Doon find in the boxes behind the secret panel?
what is the name of the holiday the entire city celebrates?
why is there a reward posted for finding Doon and Lina?
questions.answer: Because they have been accused of spreading vicious rumors

questions.text: what do Lina, Poppy, and Doon use to escape the city?
what do Lina, Poppy, and Doon find posted on the entrance to the path?
questions.answer: A sign welcoming City of Ember refugees

questions.text: who finds Lina and Doon's message at the end of the book?
does a Pipeworks Laborer and a Messenger team up to try and save their city?
do people draw job assignments once they have finished their highest class?
do we find the main characters Lina and Doon?
does a girl and her baby sister live with their grandmother who runs a yarn shop?
does lack of electricity cause the lights to go out frequently?
is the Mayor and his guards and others stealing from the City?
do the main characters use a boat to escape?
do the main characters find a creature they have never seen before - a dog - during their escape?
